name: Daily Jigsaw Mobile
description:
Played by millions around the world for the past 15 years online, Daily Jigsaw Mobile is now available for you to take wherever you go!

Key Features:
• Free puzzle every day
• Access (via In App Purchase) to past year of daily puzzles
• Access (via In App Purchase) to the next two weeks of daily puzzles
• Multiple piece mixing options
• Leaderboards
• Over 1000 possible combinations for every puzzle!
• 4 Puzzle board shapes
• 6 unique puzzle piece shapes
• 6 artist image effects
• 7 piece counts, from dozens to hundreds!
• Multi-Touch
• Save progress for offline play

*** Discover more games on Shockwave***
